name: Amber Hays
text: My husband and I came here to eat a late lunch after seeing the newest Ant Man. When we paid at the front counter the cashier asked us if there was any pizza we wanted that we didn't see on the bar. I thought it was very thoughtful of her. ‚Ä¶More

text: Ordered delivery twice. Thin crust is pretty good. Wings not so much. Delivery girls are always nice.

text: Pathetic. Employees don‚Äôt even know how to work the computer. I called and ordered a personal pizza and when I got there it took them 20 minutes to figure it out on the computer while my pizza got burnt in the warmer. I order a personal ‚Ä¶More

name: Vanessa Brooks
text: I used to dine here rather often and the food was great. This time the food was just ok and they seemed to be short staffed. There were only 2 people working. The cook, and the host who was also serving, stocking the salad bar and wiping tables.

name: Byron Keys
text: I've only been there twice, both times for the lunch buffet. Each time they had the same three kinds of pizza on the buffet. No variety at all. Ooooh but they did have a million pizzerts on there. I just asked for my money back and left. If I wanted the same 3 pizzas for that price, then I would have went to pizza hut

text: I had the same experience with the rude lady over the phone and in person,, I asked one of the associates that worked there who is she and they said, "there manager".. extremely rude and has an disgusting disposition.
